Ada Deodoran di Komponen Upah, Buruh Juga Ingin Wangi
04 Nov 2019, 00:32 by Anisa Indraini


Foto: Agung Pambudhy

Jakarta - Serikat pekerja atau serikat buruh meminta kenaikan upah minimum provinsi (UMP) dihitung berdasarkan kebutuhan hidup layak (KHL), bukan berdasarkan perhitungan angka inflasi dan pertumbuhan ekonomi seperti sekarang.Komoditas KHL yang diusulkan buruh dibagi dalam beberapa kategori. Beberapa di antaranya ada pembalut, ballpoint/pensil, hingga deodoran.Apa alasan buruh memasukkan deodorant dalam item KHL? There is Deodorant in the Wage Component, Workers Also Want to Fragrance
04 Nov 2019, 00:32 by Anisa Indraini


Photo: Agung Pambudhy

Jakarta - Trade unions or labor unions ask for a provincial minimum wage increase (UMP) calculated based on the needs of a decent living (KHL), not based on the calculation of inflation and economic growth as it is now. Some of them are pads, ballpoints / pencils, to deodorants. What is the reason for workers to put deodorants in KHL items? Check out the full news here: Continue to the next page >>> (ang / ang)
